RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUNNING ARGUMENT brush at the start, settled off the pace and the inside, began to advance three wide late in the turn, reached the leader past the furlong marker and powered by under steady handling. CUSTOM SUNSHINE broke very alertly to be immediately clear, continued to show the through the turn by daylight, offered but brief resistance to the winner a furlong out, remained far clear of the rest. LONG LEGGED LADY broke out and bobbled, raced back, moved out for the drive, along for the show, no threat to the top pair. CAJUN ROCK STAR chased the runner up in the two path for a quarter and began to weaken, caught late for the show. C C LLAM in tight at the start, fell back to trail and was never a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Sunshine
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke very sharp, quickly clear, no match late, far clear rest

ENTRY.NAME: Long Legged Lady
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J Our Blue Streaks Stable and Pomier Chasey Deville
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bobbled, raced back, moved out drive, along show

ENTRY.NAME: C C Llam
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, fell back and trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Running Argument
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush start, settled, 3w advance, powered by leaders

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Rock Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader two path, weakened, caught 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 13, 2023 Al lowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000 (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GALAXY THIRTYSIX within striking distance early, moved closer three wide late in the turn, saw that progress stall while drifting out steadily during the middle part of the stretch, straightened, late surge to be up in time. SIENNA BREEZE broke alertly, pressed the early leader from along the inside, challenged along the rail turn, took over, clear past the furlong marker, continued to hole a daylight advantage late, could not contain the winner. TUGBOAT last away, lacked speed, came four wide for the drive, slow gain on the top two late while fully extended to preserve the show. LOVERS NEVER SAY within striking distance in the run up the backstretch, went evenly through the lane in lacking a closing response. SHELLI'S ANGEL trailed off the inside, four wide midway on the turn, three wide exiting, failed to rally. SOPHIE'S PRAYER took control out of the gate, showed the way up the backstretch in the two path, caved in when headed.

ENTRY.NAME: Sienna Breeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, pressed inside, took over turn, shook clear,nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Lovers Never Say
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Galaxy Thirtysix
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance,closer 3w, drifted out stretch, up

ENTRY.NAME: Tugboat
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, back, 4w into lane, all out show

ENTRY.NAME: Shelli's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, 4w mid turn, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Sophie's Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead 2p, caved when headed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 30000. FOR ALABAMA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Maiden, Claiming, Or Starter Allowed 3 lbs. Maidens Allowed 5 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIKEN IT in the second flight while three wide, vied on the outside through the turn, drove steadily clear through the stretch. FIRED UP TIGER broke alertly, cleared toward the inside, showed the way into the turn, raced on equal terms with the winner and another rival through the turn along the rail, proved no match for the winner through the stretch, held sway for the place. FOOLISH STEVE forwardly placed early, vied between rivals through the turn between the top pair, outkicked for the place, far clear of the other tw0. UNCLE BRAD went one paced throughout in lacking a closing response. UNITEDAPPEAL last away, trailed throughout in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: Unitedappeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Foolish Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, vied btwn foes turn, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Brad
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in lacking a closing response

ENTRY.NAME: Liken It
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight 3w, vied outside turn, drove steadily clear

ENTRY.NAME: Fired Up Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, clear early, vied inside turn, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 91. Starter Allowance Purse 24000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 AND HAVE NOT WON A RACE ON THE TURF IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 13, 2023 A llowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since February 13, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHAOSMOS took command after the start, clear onto the backstretch, rated kindly the middle half mile, shrugged off a rival turning for home, plenty left to remain well clear. RUN ROCKET settled off the pace inside, continued to save ground through the final turn, eased off the rail a bit for the drive but still challenged for the runner up spot inside another rival, dueled with that one to the wire and proved game while not a serious threat to the winner. ONE TIME GEM closest to the winner, advanced and tried that one from the outside late in the second turn, could not keep up in the drive,outkicked late for the place position. BAYOU JAM one paced off the inside, crept closer in the three path through the second turn, flattened out a bit in the drive, not enough for the show late. BLUERIDGE MOUNTAIN last to leave, raced four wide through the final turn, asked into the lane, went flat to the wire to also be found lacking late. GUITAR TRIBUTE fell back to trail, was never a serious threat while making up some ground late with some mild late interest out in the course.

ENTRY.NAME: Blueridge Mountain
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, 4w 2nd turn, went flat through the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Run Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, saved ground,inside bid 2nd, game

ENTRY.NAME: One Time Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, brief, mild bid outside leader, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bayou Jam
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off rail, crept a bit closer 2nd,lacked further bid

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Tribute
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, never a serious threat while making up some ground late

ENTRY.NAME: Chaosmos
ENTRY.COMMENT: took command, clear, rated kindly,plenty left stretch

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: J. M. Herbener Jr. & Matthew R Herbener

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 54. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAJUN CARLOS stalked the pace up the backstretch out in the strip, challenged three wide turn, began to draw steadily clear when straightened for home and slowly increased that margin to the wire while kept to pressure. FRIEND'S DO CARE vied early while off the inside, contested the issue while between horses through the turn, could not match strides with the winner through the lane, clearly second best. WHISKEY RED back off the pace and the inside, came in the two path for the drive, rallied mildly to earn the show. COLE'S SENSATION fell back after the start, saved ground turn, picked off a couple of tiring rivals while never a threat. POPPA BEAR off a step slow, well back early, four wide into the lane, made little impact to the wire. HEZA CHAIN BREAKER flashed early foot along the inside, began to gave way after a half. BELLAMY BROTHER raced in mid pack for a half, backed up while three wide.

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Chain Breaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: early foot inside, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Cole's Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after the start, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Friend's Do Care
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early off the inside, between foes turn, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Carlos
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked early 3w, outside bid turn, vied into lane,steadily clear

ENTRY.NAME: Poppa Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, well back, 4w into lane, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 2p turn, mild rally show

ENTRY.NAME: Bellamy Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack for a half, backed up three wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 7 1/2F Turf CR: 77. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 32000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 13, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $ 12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALLIACEOUS tracked the leaders toward the inside, raced in some traffic second turn, split foes when challenging nearing the furlong grounds, drove strongly clear. GLANCE lacked early foot in settling into a rhythm, raced four wide through the second turn when beginning to advance, came five wide for the drive, continued to rally willingly down the lane to be in time for the place, not a threat to the winner. BROKEN PROPOSAL broke out and slowly, moved up outside to race in mid pack, closer into the far turn, four wide into the lane while seeing progress stall, angled in, found more late to miss the place. COINMAKER prompted the issue early, moved to duel before a half, continued to alternate up front second turn, weakened through the stretch. GURKHA GOLD (IRE) fell back to trail after the start, lacked a serious bid. SHE A HOT MESS dueled early along the inside, began a steady retreat before a half. SERIOUSLY SAM dueled early off the inside, disposed of that rival before a half only to be joined by a second rival, narrowly showed the way through upper stretch then stopped late.

ENTRY.NAME: She a Hot Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early, steady fade

ENTRY.NAME: Alliaceous
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, traffic 2nd turn, split foes upper, drive clear

ENTRY.NAME: Seriously Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early, again midway, stopped deep stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Gurkha Gold (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Coinmaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, moved to duel, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Glance
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, raced outside, 4-5 w 2nd turn, rallied 2nd,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Broken Proposal
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out and slowly, mid pack, closer 3w 2nd,stalled, angled in

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 10000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE NOVEMBER 13, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 13, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 13, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Suc h A Race Since March 13, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BIG MONEY MACHINE with the leaders early, fell back by midway on the first turn, advanced and lodged an early rail bid just before a half, saved ground and cut the corner into the lane to garner a daylight advantage, held the runner up safe late. HUMPHREY four wide when forwardly placed, continued outside, four wide again second bend when being asked, drifted out badly through the stretch but was still coming late to be getting to the winner. MIND ON MY MONEY vied up front while off the inside, continued to battle through the second bend, could no keep up with the winner in chasing that one past the furlong marker, caught late for the runner up spot. BAND BOSS narrowly set the pace inside early, allowed the winner the inside before a half, vied with that one and two others through the second bend and began to weakend. BASSETT fell back after vying the opening quarter and failed to menace. LIAM SKYE five wide when with the lead pack first turn, continued wide up the backstretch, five wide again through the second bend, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Band Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: narrowly set pace, allowed winner inside 1/2, weakend

ENTRY.NAME: Big Money Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back early, inside bid, cut corner, held, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Bassett
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early, fell back, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Mind On My Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied off the inside, chased stretch, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Humphrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Westmark Richard N and Westmark Mary S
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, asked 4w 2nd, drifted out badly, coming late

ENTRY.NAME: Liam Skye
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w both turns, trailed home

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 75. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming At A Mile Or Over Allowed 3 lbs . Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MI SOLUTION broke on top set the pace while under light restraint just off the inside, came out slightly into the far turn while continuing to show the way, steadily widened through the lane while kept to pressure. DOUBLE ON THE RED last to leave, lacked early foot, saved ground through the second bend when beginning to improve, between foes nearing midstraight, continued willingly to the wire to be well clear of the others. RUN ON ACES within striking distance, moved closer along the inside second turn, closest to the winner past the furlong marker, weakened a bit late, nod for the show. VETERANS DAY chased the winner, bothered slightly when that one came out a bit into the far turn, fell back off that one into the lane and continued to weaken to the wire. ITS WILD AGAIN fell back to trail, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. MY LIL DUDE forwardly placed for a half, fell back. FIELD OF VISION settled off the pace, well wide through the final turn, had nothing for the drive. A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF VETERANS DAY AGAINST THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE INTO THE FAR TURN WAS NOT ALLOWED.

ENTRY.NAME: Its Wild Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, passed couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Veterans Day
ENTRY.OWNER: World War IV Racing and Rebel Tide Racing, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to the winner, bothered slightly 3/8, weakened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: My Lil Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: forward early, fell back after half

ENTRY.NAME: Run On Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, closer inside, flattened out,caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Double On the Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of speed, inside 2nd turn, willing 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mi Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace just off inside, widened stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Field of Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, wide trip, had nothing for the drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAZZ back off the pace and the inside, raced four out to five wide to lose some ground to the leaders into the lane, firmly roused, lacked kick to be up in time. ROLL ON OUT broke alertly, set the early pace in the two path, vied through the turn while between horses, continued to hold a narrow advantage past the furlong marker, gave ground grudgingly to the winner late. WICKED TOUGH lacked early foot, came on the outside for the drive, angled steadily to the rail past the furlong marker, up for the show while closest to the rail of the top flight. MARVINS' WARRIOR prominent in the run up the backstretch, closer to vie three wide and on the outside through the turn, faltered in the drive. ARKANSAS ZONG moved up to vie inside the runner up into the turn, continued on equal terms into the stretch and began to weaken. RED ON THE HEAD went one paced and failed to rally. SMOOTH CUSTOM fell back to trail after the start and never menaced.

ENTRY.NAME: Arkansas Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: away in good order, moved up inside to vie, weakened drive

ENTRY.NAME: Marvins' Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: prominent up backstretch, vied 3w turn, faltered drive

ENTRY.NAME: Red On the Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Tough
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, outside for the drive, angled in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Razz
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 4-5w into lane, late surge to be best

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Custom
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, never menace

ENTRY.NAME: Roll On Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, early pace 2p, vied turn, long drive, grudgingly
